Class Boss

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Boss

  • public class Boss
extends Entity
    This data class models the Boss and is a type of entity. The difference between the boss and an entity is that the boss has health.
    Version:
    5.0
    Author:
    Aviv Haber. Created the class on June 2. Approximate Work: 0.5 hours, Rian Waterson. Fixed the Boss constructor to use the super class contrcutor. Approximate Work: 0.5 hours

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double MAX_HEALTH
      The starting health of the boss.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Boss(int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Initializes the boss by setting the coordinates, width, height, and initial health.
